summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pediatrics to Go application with new Nightingale-inspired UI design. All UI changes verified successfully including floating pill-shaped tab bar, teal accent colors, gradient backgrounds, rounded cards, and active tab indicators. All functionality working correctly including navigation, dialogs, calculator, and theme toggle.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent accessibility

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (/api/, /api/status, /api/blood-gas/analyze) - all working correctly
Landing page loads with 'Pediatrics to Go' title and stethoscope logo
Floating pill-shaped tab bar at bottom with white/dark styling and rounded corners
Teal accent color (#00d9c5) properly implemented throughout UI
Gradient background (teal to white in light mode, deep teal in dark mode)
Rounded cards with shadows using Nightingale styling
NICU and Children cards with proper rounded corners and hover effects
Children card properly disabled with 'Coming Soon' badge
All 5 tab icons present: Home (active), Blood Gas, Electrolytes, Coming Soon, Jaundice
Home tab shows active state with teal underline indicator
Theme toggle works correctly switching between light and dark modes
Dark mode shows deep teal gradient background and dark tab bar
NICU card navigation to /nicu route works correctly
NICU Calculator page preserves floating tab bar design
Calculator functionality works with test values (weight=2.5, age=5, TFI=120, feed=30)
Results display correctly with teal accent (Remaining IV: 225.0 ml, Hourly: 9.38 ml/hr)
Back button returns to landing page correctly
Blood Gas dialog opens and closes properly with correct title
Electrolytes dialog opens and closes properly with correct title
Jaundice dialog opens and closes properly with 'Neonatal Jaundice Calculator' title
Jaundice tab shows active state with amber color when dialog is open
Active tab indicator (teal underline) updates correctly for each tab
All dialogs can be closed with Escape key
Nightingale card styling with proper shadows and hover effects
Glass header effect with backdrop blur
Proper font usage (Manrope for headings, JetBrains Mono for monospace)

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All Nightingale UI elements, navigation, dialogs, calculator, and theme functionality working correctly
